backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user cards with access control, card CRUD logic, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing affected frontend files and components for two feature tickets.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and responsibilities of each major frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base definitions and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling auth flow, actor initialization, profile loading, timeouts, and tabbed navigation UI.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: React dialog for adding cards with validation, autocomplete suggestions, and submission via addCard mutation.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Autocomplete text input with filtered suggestions, focus handling, and click-outside closing.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Displays a card with rarity styling, purchase/sale info, and dialogs for editing, selling, or deleting.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Modal listing crafted cards with rarity badges, purchase details, and metadata fields.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Dialog for editing a card's details, handling form state and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches UI errors and shows a detailed error message with reset functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding and authentication controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Initial profile setup modal prompting the user to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Large dialog component for selling or trading cards, including forms for sale details and adding new cards with rarity and payment helpers.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal displaying sold and traded cards, with profit/loss calculations and expandable trade groups.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Exposes query state for the actor initialization to allow UI error handling and manual retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file for Google authentication logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, cards, and transactions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Page displaying user cards with extensive filtering options and an add-card dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Portfolio dashboard calculating totals, profits, and transaction metrics with modals for sold and crafted cards.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Utility functions generating unique card field suggestions and filtering them by user input.
frontend/src/utils/redactSecrets.ts: Helpers to redact sensitive values from text, errors, and logs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking features, issues, and metadata.
